articles.description: The beverage giant will significantly pare its roster as it seeks marketing efficiencies.
articles.content: Coca-Cola Co. is undertaking a massive agency review that puts every media and creative account up for grabs across the globe for its roughly 400 brands as the beverage giant looks to significantly r… [+4901 chars]
